str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; ?Non, a place in Palestine.
Near. From a primary verb agcho; near.
Salim -- a place in Palestine. Probably from the same as saleuo; Salim, a place in Palestine.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and ginomai; to become near, i.e. Approach; by implication, to appear publicly.
